name: There Will Always Be An End
name_original: There Will Always Be An End
description:
You Have to complete each level to find a new beginning whose end will be a new beginning. Always have present you will only be able to finish the game when you: Die, Escape and Exit. They will only be used once. Sorry for the bugs and bad quality of everything, please feel free to give feedback. This game is/was made for Brackey's Game Jam 2023.1.

I used:

Godot Engine

ProCreate

GarageBand

The song was composed by me. My first game ever released so I hope you enjoy it.
